title: Awkwafinahangs out with fellow comic Ali Wong at Variety Power Of Women fete
text:
They bonded on Twitter in April when one was mistaken for the other.

And Awkwafina posed up a storm in person with Ali Wong at the Variety Power Of Women bash at the Beverly Wilshire Four Seasons Hotel on Friday.

Awkwafina, 30, is one of the honorees at the luncheon amid a list that features Mariah Carey, Jennifer Aniston, Chaka Khan, Dana Walden and Brie Larson.

Side by side: Awkwafina posed up a storm in person with Ali Wong at the Variety Power Of Women bash at the Beverly Wilshire Four Seasons Hotel on Friday

Ali and Awkwafina got together in front of the themed backdrop and flashed peace signs as the shutterbugs snapped away.

Awkwafina slipped into a color-block shirt dress done in navy, canary yellow and white with a massive frilly pocket square.

Meanwhile, Ali slid her slender frame into a summery floor-length gown that featured several shades of green, posing with a hand at her waist.

Awkwafina joked onstage during the luncheon: 'I can’t believe I’m in the company of such amazing women - I will literally need many a Xanax to deal with that later.'

Feted: Awkwafina, 30, is one of the honorees at the luncheon amid a list that features Mariah Carey, Jennifer Aniston, Chaka Khan, Dana Walden and Brie Larson

So sweet: Ali and Awkwafina got together in front of the themed backdrop and chatted warmly as the shutterbugs snapped away

She shared in a speech tweeted in clips by Variety: 'I’m so proud to be here in support of Building Beats' - a nonprofit with which she has partnered.

'It’s an organization dedicated to kids with a focus on minority and underserved communities. It provides them with free digital music and production courses as well as entrepreneurial classes, the tools they need to be in charge of their own future and to be in charge of their own destiny,' she explained.

The Crazy Rich Asians star said: 'Sometimes I don’t feel power, and I’ve talked a lot about Impostor Syndrome. I’m literally the- a walking definition of Impostor Syndrome. But you know, I think that’s something that we all go through sometimes.'

Dapper: Awkwafina slipped into a color-block shirt dress done in navy, canary yellow and white with a massive frilly pocket square

Chic as ever: Meanwhile, Ali slid her slender frame into a summery floor-length gown that featured several shades of green, posing with a hand at her waist

She went on: 'But I’ve come to realize that the true power we possess comes through our stories and how they influence others to believe in their own. The power of my story – a girl with the voice of a pro wrestler, the body of Pikachu - the fact that I am standing before you means that someone else can do it too. Thank you.'

This April, she wrote on Twitter: 'A man came up 2 me at CVS and told me I’m his fave comedian n how I "inspired him to follows his dreams." I was v flattered by his words, even felt a lil emotional. He then asked if i was actually pregnant during Baby Cobra bc this b**** rly thought I was @aliwong'.

Ali, who became a star with a stand-up special called Baby Cobra that she recorded while expecting her firstborn daughter, replied with a crying laughing emoji.

'This b**** rly thought I was @aliwong': They bonded on Twitter in April when one was mistaken for the other in a CVS
description: They bonded on Twitter in April when one was mistaken for the other.
